home.contact:
Basically, I can respond by joining my Discord server and contacting me there, or by direct messaging me on Discord.
I might not notice them when I am out, so if it's urgent, please send me an email instead.

I am not very good at this game but fun to play it once in a while.
mc:
It is one of the games i have been playing for the longest period.
I no longer play Wii U Edition and Bedrock Edition, I currently play the Java Edition. On the Wii U Edition,
I was building frequently. Since i started Bedrock Edition,
I have been developing add-ons and shader packs but i got sick of Bedrock Edition because of the repeated
's shit. Currently, I am developing a shader pack for Java Edition at my own pace.

music.listen: I like piano music in the classical era and romantic era, and i especially listen to Franz Liszt's pieces. Recently, i started to listen to not only piano music but also orchestral compositions and classical song.
music.play:
I play classical music on the piano but not very good at it.
And i quickly get tired of piano practice, so i'm often satisfied with playing only some of my favorite melodies.
compose:
I compose classical like music and arrange/transcribe classical music. Sometimes compose songs like popular music.
But i don't know anything about code progression, etc. because i hardly consider theory. Basically i compose in
music.sing: I don't usually sing because i'm not very familiar with songs that have lyrics. The songs i can sing are Pretty Cure songs, GHIBLI songs that i bought on CD and listened to in the past, and other songs that i was made to sing at compulsory education school, etc..

2011.null: Around this time, called myself rinrin and was playing Ameba Pigg on Windows 7.

2013.4: Entered the special support class of elementary school.

2016.12: Played Minecraft(Wii U Edition) for the first time.

2019.3: Moved again after graduating from elementary school, this time to Chiba Prefecture.
2019.4: Started playing Minecraft Bedrock Edition (Windows 10 Edition)

2020.5: Started learning Python because i wanted to create a Discord bot (FATAL MISTAKE)
2020.null: From the middle of the year, my congenital disorder begins to worsen.

2021.4: Can hardly speak after the spring break and become a truant.
2021.5: Started developing shaderpacks for Minecraft Windows Edition.
2021.11: Started learning Rust so stops using Python.

2022.3: Bought a new desktop computer. On that day it arrived, tried to install Arch Linux but it failed. eventually reinstalled Windows.
2022.6: Really hate Windows so installed openSUSE as main OS. Somehow installed successfully this time.

2036.4: I have wondered.. right after i was born...how old i would be 30 years from now.
